																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Graduate Students											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-profiles view-id-os_profiles view-display-id-page view-dom-id-4bf17550beb872a6995ab10fac9f0b07">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-295796" class="node node-person node-teaser article modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="no-default-image"></div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/illana-freedman" rel="bookmark">Illana Freedman</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student </div></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-690291" class="node node-person node-teaser article modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="no-default-image"></div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/zhe-geng" rel="bookmark">Zhe (Carrie) Geng</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student<br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>Fields of Interests:</strong> Late 19th and 20th century British, Chinese, American, and French literature; fin de siècle British and French</p> <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/zhe-geng" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Zhe (Carrie) Geng</span></a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:zgeng@g.harvard.edu" >zgeng@g.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-144891" class="node node-person node-teaser article modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="no-default-image"></div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/peli-grietzer" rel="bookmark">Peli Grietzer</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student: Graduating November 2017<br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>Research Fields:</strong> <span style="font-family:arial,sans,sans-serif; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; color:#000000; text-align:left">Modernism, The Avant-garde, Literature and Concept Learning, Science and Literature, Digital Humanities, Poetics, Conceptual Writing, Affect Studies. <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/peli-grietzer" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Peli Grietzer</span></a></span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:grietzer@fas.harvard.edu" >grietzer@fas.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-649956" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1386608196" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1386608196"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter by Role</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1386608196' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-department-administration"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/department-administration"  class="" title="">Department Administration <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-emeriti---emeritae-faculty"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/emeritus-faculty"  class="" title="">Emeriti / Emeritae Faculty <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-faculty"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/faculty"  class="" title="Please click on Faculty Names for more information about each of them.">Faculty <span class="count">(31)</span></a></li><li class="term-graduate-students"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/graduate-students"  class="" title="">Graduate Students <span class="count">(47)</span></a></li><li class="term-undergraduate-tutorial-board"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/tutorial-board"  class="" title="">Undergraduate Tutorial Board <span class="count">(11)</span></a></li><li class="term-visiting-scholars"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/role/visiting-scholar"  class="" title="">Visiting Scholars <span class="count">(11)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><div id="block-boxes-solr-search-box" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_search_solr_search_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="solr_search_box"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

  </nav></div>		  <!--main menu region end-->
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">

                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student <br />Tutorial Board Teaching Fellow</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<br /><strong><strong>Research Fields:</strong> </strong>Comparative visual and media studies; the digital and the virtual; materiality, text and texture; film theory; modernism and the avant-gardes; spectatorship, affect, and emotion; fashion theory; continental philosophy; aesthetics; art history; corporeality and performance; space theory and disorientation; urbanism and technology; architectural theory; psychoanalysis; the renaissance; trauma and memory studies; translation; Nabokov; Beckett.
</p>

                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student<br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p></p> <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/botagoz-ussen" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Botagoz Ussen</span></a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:ussenb@g.harvard.edu" >ussenb@g.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-295831" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/hudson-vincent" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/complit/files/hudson_vincent.jpg?m=1410207741&amp;itok=xf4OVXZY" width="75" height="75" alt="Hudson Vincent" title="Hudson Vincent" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/hudson-vincent" rel="bookmark">Hudson Vincent</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student <br />Tutorial Board Teaching Fellow<br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p class="DefaultText"><strong>Research Fields:  </strong>Early modern literature, aesthetics, philosophy, and science; the Renaissance; the Baroque; classical literature (Greek and Latin); Hellenistic poetry; Augustan poetry; classical philosophy and oratory; epic; art history; philology; continental philosophy; post-45 French theory; cultural studies; history of literary theory (classical to postmodern) <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/hudson-vincent" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Hudson Vincent</span></a></p></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:rvincent@g.harvard.edu" >rvincent@g.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-145486" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/thomas-wisniewski" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/complit/files/tom.jpg?m=1402608351&amp;itok=x814cy5n" width="75" height="75" alt="Thomas Wisniewski" title="Thomas Wisniewski" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/thomas-wisniewski" rel="bookmark">Thomas Wisniewski</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student <br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p class="DefaultText"><strong><strong>Research fields: </strong></strong>Nineteenth- and twentieth-century British, American, French, Italian, Spanish, and Latin American literature; modernism and the fin-de-siècle; the comparative arts: music, dance, and literature; translation studies and literary translation; prosody and prose metrics; forms of narrative: the novel, the novella, the short story; Borges, Joyce, Woolf, Flaubert, Proust, Orwell, Hemingway, Dinesen, Svevo, Pirandello, Debussy.</p><p class="DefaultText"> <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/thomas-wisniewski" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Thomas Wisniewski</span></a></p></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:twisniew@fas.harvard.edu" >twisniew@fas.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd views-row-last">
    <article id="node-145506" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/emma-zophia-zachurski" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/complit/files/ezachurski.jpg?m=1392402181&amp;itok=SulsoUEa" width="75" height="75" alt="Emma Zofia Zachurski" title="Emma Zofia Zachurski" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/emma-zophia-zachurski" rel="bookmark">Emma Zofia Zachurski</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student <br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>Research interests: </strong>My dissertation focuses on the re-mapping and re-molding of Paris's image from the televised to digitized era through various literary, film, and arts movements spanning the 1950s to today. <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/emma-zophia-zachurski" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Emma Zofia Zachurski</span></a></p></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-email field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="mailto:zachurski@fas.harvard.edu" >zachurski@fas.harvard.edu</a></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>

													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Graduate Students											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-profiles view-id-os_profiles view-display-id-page view-dom-id-6b3b4c5b6e6f57e6d914777cbf39e9e0">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-126466" class="node node-person node-teaser article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/lusia-zaitseva" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/complit/files/image001_0.jpg?m=1392825633&amp;itok=T6ikQdPk" width="75" height="75" alt="Lusia  A. Zaitseva" title="Lusia  A. Zaitseva" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/lusia-zaitseva" rel="bookmark">Lusia  A. Zaitseva</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student <br /> </div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong><strong>Research Fields:</strong> </strong>Gender studies, psychoanalytic theory, poetry and poetics (mainly Russian and Urdu), post-colonialism, children’s literature and ‘childishness’ more broadly, Stalin-era literature, the short story (American, Russian, Hindi), theater, love poetry, memory and witnessing, trauma and trauma theory, Holocaust fiction and narrative, narratology, translation.</p><p><strong> <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/lusia-zaitseva" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Lusia  A. Zaitseva</span></a></strong></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-website field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://scholar.harvard.edu/zaitseva"  title="Lusia  A. Zaitseva&#039;s website">Website</a><br /></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-address field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">zaitseva[at]fas.harvard.edu</div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-145511" class="node node-person node-teaser article modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      
    
    <div class="no-default-image"></div>    
    <div class="person-teaser-wrapper">  
              <header class="node-header">
                      <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
              <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/people/simos-zeniou" rel="bookmark">Simos Zenios</a>
            </h1>
                  </header>
        
      <div class="node-content">
        <div class="pic-bio clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Graduate Student </div></div></div></div>      </div>
    
          
          
          </div>
    
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">

				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/pages/undergraduate" >UNDERGRADUATE</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
													              <a name="main-content"></a>
															<header id="main-content-header">
									<a name="main-content"></a>
                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Undergraduate Alumni                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-155181" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	Students who have concentrated in Literature have gone on to careers in a variety of fields:  academics, journalism, film, law, medicine, and business, among others. Please see our <strong><a href="http://complit.fas.harvard.edu/alumni-list">Alumni List</a></strong>
</p>

<p>
	Here is what some of our alumni have to say about our concentration: <strong><strong><a href="http://complit.fas.harvard.edu/alumni-voices">Alumni Voices</a></strong></strong>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
</div>
  </div></div></div></div>																																			</div>
								<!--front panel regions end-->
													
											</div>
				</div>

								  <!--sidebar first region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-os-pages-section-nav" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_sectionnav section-nav no-title"  module="boxes" delta="os_pages_section_nav"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_pages_section_nav' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><ul class="menu clearfix"><li class="first last expanded active-trail active-trail menu-depth-1 menu-item-38526"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/pages/undergraduate"  class="active-trail active">Undergraduate</a><ul class="menu clearfix"><li class="first collapsed menu-depth-2 menu-item-42866"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/pages/prospective-students" >Prospective Students</a></li><li class="leaf menu-depth-2 menu-item-56516"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/sophomores" >Sophomores</a></li><li class="leaf menu-depth-2 menu-item-56526"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/juniors" >Juniors</a></li><li class="leaf menu-depth-2 menu-item-56531"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/seniors" >Seniors</a></li><li class="leaf menu-depth-2 menu-item-125981"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/tutorial-board" >Comp Lit Undergraduate Tutorial Board</a></li><li class="leaf menu-depth-2 menu-item-42876"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/pages/secondary-field-literature" >Secondary Field in Comparative Literature</a></li><li class="last expanded active-trail active-trail menu-depth-2 menu-item-52311"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/undergraduate-alumni"  class="active-trail active active">Undergraduate Alumni</a><ul class="menu clearfix"><li class="first leaf menu-depth-3 menu-item-124076"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/alumni-list" >Alumni List</a></li><li class="last collapsed menu-depth-3 menu-item-124066"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/alumni-voices" >Alumni Voices</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>
		</div>

								<div class="region region-footer-first"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1393429000" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_media no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1393429000"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1393429000' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-133626" class="file file-image file-image-png">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="https://complit.fas.harvard.edu/files/complit/files/comp_lit_logo_blk.png?m=1486532377">comp_lit_logo_blk.png</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <img class="image-style-os-files-xxlarge" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_xxlarge/public/complit/files/comp_lit_logo_blk.png?m=1499733411&amp;itok=YGrMF-2l" width="303" height="70" alt="" title="" />  </div>

  
</div>
</div></div></div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1387208855" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1387208855"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1387208855' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<br /><strong>Department of Comparative Literature</strong><br />16 Quincy Street<br />Dana-Palmer House<br />Cambridge, MA 02138<br />Phone: 617-495-1900<br /><a href="http://complit.fas.harvard.edu/pages/contact">Contact us</a><br /><br /> 
</p>
</div></div></div>
